Member Function Documentation

void OpenSim.Region.Framework.Interfaces.IAsyncSceneObjectGroupDeleter.DeleteToInventory ( DeRezAction  action,
UUID  folderID,
List< ISceneEntity >  objectGroups,
UUID  AgentId,
bool  permissionToDelete,
bool  permissionToTake 
)

Deletes the given groups to the given user's inventory in the given folderID.

Parameters:
action The reason these objects are being sent to inventory
folderID The folder the objects will be added into, if you want the default folder, set this to UUID.Zero
objectGroups The groups to send to inventory
AgentId The agent who is deleting the given groups (not the owner of the objects necessarily)
permissionToDelete If true, the objects will be deleted from the sim as well
permissionToTake If true, the objects will be added to the user's inventory as well

Implemented in Aurora.Modules.Entities.ObjectDelete.AsyncSceneObjectGroupDeleter.
